Class playn.core.Sound

Changed from an interface to a class. Changed from abstract to non-abstract.

Added Constructors
Sound() Creates the sound of silence.
 

Removed Methods
void addCallback(Callback<Sound>) Adds a callback to be notified when this sound has loaded.
 

Added Methods
boolean isLoaded() Returns whether this sound is fully loaded.
 

Changed Methods
boolean isPlaying() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Determine whether this audio stream is currently playing.
boolean play() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. If possible, begin playback of this audio stream.
boolean prepare() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Prepares this sound to be played by preloading it into audio buffers.
void release() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Releases resources used by this sound.
void setLooping(boolean) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Set whether audio stream playback should be looped indefinitely or not.
void setVolume(float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. @param volume new volume between {@literal 0.0} and {@literal 1.0}
void stop() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Stop playback of the current audio stream as soon as possible, and reset the sound position to its starting position, such that a subsequent call to .play() will cause the audio file to being playback from the beginning of the audio stream.
float volume() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. @return the current volume of this sound, a value between {@literal 0.0} and {@literal 1.0}.
 

Added Fields
RFuture<Sound> state Reports the asynchronous loading of this sound.
